articles.title: Ceremony of Completion of Rungna People's Pleasure Ground Held in Presence of Marshal Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Rungna People's Pleasure Ground Opens in Presence of Marshal Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- The Rungna People's Pleasure Ground has been built in Pyongyang as another grand edifice. 
					 It is one of the projects leader Kim Jong Il was specially interested in. It is a product of loving care for people of Marshal Kim Jong Un as well as a socialist wealth to hand down for all ages. 
					
					 It consists of Dolphinarium, Wading Pool, Fun Fair and mini golf course on Rungna Islet in the picturesque Taedong River.
					
					 An opening ceremony took place with splendor on Wednesday.
					
					 Kim Jong Un and his wife Ri Sol Ju were present at the ceremony.
					
					 All the participants enthusiastically welcomed them, loudly shouting "Hurrah!"
					
					 A soldier builder and woman worker presented him bunches of flowers.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Jong Gak, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Kang Sok Ju, Kim Won Hong, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Kim Phyong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok, Kwak Pom Gi, Ro Tu Chol, Ri Pyong Sam and officials of party, armed forces and power bodies, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, soldier builders, working people and school youth and children in the city.
					
					 Present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys, representatives of international organizations and charge d'affaires ad interims of foreign missions here and their wives.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam and Choe Yong Rim cut the tape, declaring the pleasure ground open.
					
					 Kim Jong Un and Ri Sol Ju toured the pleasure ground together with senior party, state and army officials, diplomatic envoys, representatives of international organizations and charge d'affaires ad interims of foreign missions here and their wives.
					
					ã€€In the Rungna Dolphinarium, he toured the hall for viewing dolphins, the performance tub, the room for scientific and technological knowledge, etc. He underscored the need to serve the visitors' convenience on the highest level for their enjoyment.
					
					 He and his wife, together with diplomatic envoys, representatives of international organizations and charge d'affaires ad interims of foreign missions here and their wives, saw dolphins playing stunts to the tune of joyful music. He, with a bright smile on his face, pictured the optimistic and emotional life the people, school youth and children will enjoy. 
					
					 He and his wife shook hands with the diplomatic envoys, representatives of international organizations and charge d' affaires ad interims of foreign missions here and their wives one by one as they extended warm congratulations and best wishes, and talked with them in an amicable and friendly atmosphere.
					
					 After going round the mini golf course, he went to the Rungna Wading Pool. He said with great satisfaction that the wading pool was built as a wonderful cultural rest place of the people as all its facilities including tub for wading, bathing booth and shower room have been built in a fresh and multi-functional way in good harmony with the surrounding environment.
					
					 Seeing university students riding a very high water slide and enjoying matches at beach volleyball, basketball and volleyball courts, he called for providing the people with many entertainment conditions on the highest level that can be proud of in the world.
					
					 He went to the Rungna Fun Fair and was very pleased to hear happy laughing of people riding amusement apparatuses.
					
					 It is the intention of the Workers' Party of Korea to make the Korean people, the best one in the world, live in luxury and comfort under socialism to their heart's content as they have remained loyal to the party, overcoming all difficulties, he said, underlining the need to manage and operate the pleasure ground in good way.

articles.title: Spokesman for DPRK FM Calls for Peace on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
Spokesman for DPRK FM Calls for Peace on Korean Peninsula
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry issued the following statement Wednesday:
					 59 years have passed since the Korean Armistice Agreement (AA) was signed but the war has not been terminated technically.
					
					 By nature, AA was a transitional step which specified that negotiations should be held at a political level within three months with an aim to have all foreign forces withdrawn from the Korean Peninsula and ensure a durable peace there.
					
					 But the U.S. deliberately opted to keep the truce long. In November 1953 it defined it as the final goal to realize the "pro-American unification" of the Korean Peninsula. The U.S. also adopted the "National Security Council Resolution 170" to make south Korea its "military ally" while keeping the armistice system until the goal is attained. 
					
					 Pursuant to it, the U.S. disrupted the Geneva meeting for a peaceful settlement of the Korean issue, massively shipped into south Korea modern weapons including nuclear weapons in violation of AA and has consistently staged war maneuvers under various codenames. 
					
					 It has persistently avoided the conclusion of a peace agreement and kept the state of belligerency on the Korean Peninsula. This is the most typical expression of its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 It has systematically scrapped major provisions of AA, steadily increased military and nuclear threats to the DPRK and in the long run compelled it to have access to nuclear weapons.
					
					 The unstable truce between the DPRK and the United States has persisted on the Korean Peninsula for 59 years. This is a very abnormal situation unprecedented in the world history of wars.
					
					 The second Korean war has been headed off in the Korean Peninsula in which the two sides stand in the most acute military stand-off. It would have been unthinkable without the DPRK's Songun politics and effective war deterrent based on self-defensive nuclear forces. Those countries without nuclear deterrent were brought down without exception in face of military intervention of hostile forces aimed at toppling social systems. This is a stark reality in the present century.
					
					 The DPRK will never abandon nuclear deterrent first as long as the U.S., the biggest nuclear weapons state in the world, remains hostile toward the former.
					
					 Had the U.S. sincerely implemented any one of its commitments to AA, the resolution of the 30th UN General Assembly session on having the U.S. forces withdrawn from south Korea and the DPRK-U.S. agreements in which it promised not to antagonize the DPRK, a durable peace would have settled on the Korean Peninsula and the situation would not have reached the brink of a nuclear war as today.
					
					 It is the consistent stand of the DPRK to settle the problems through dialogue and negotiations but all the dialogues cannot but be "ones for the sake of dialogue" unless the U.S. rolls back its hostile policy. This is the review of the nearly 60-year-long history of armistice.
					
					 The U.S. should not just claim that it does not have any hostile intention to the DPRK in words but prove it in such practical actions as making a bold decision to replace AA with a peace agreement without any excuse or precondition.
					
					 To abandon the hostile policy cannot be a "present" or bargaining in any case. The U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK must be rolled back first unconditionally as it is unreasonable and anachronistic. Only when one party does not antagonize the other party and when they sit face to face on an equal footing, will it be possible to have dialogue in the true sense of the word and settle all problems of mutual concern.
					
					 One way of solving the problem is to sign a peace agreement with the U.S. and another one is to root out the cause of war from the Korean Peninsula for a durable peace.
					
					 The ball is in the court of the U.S.

articles.title: History of War Victory Everlasting: KCNA Report
articles.content:
History of War Victory Everlasting: KCNA Report
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- KCNA Wednesday released a report "History of great victory in war against U.S. imperialism is everlasting". It deals with great feats Generalissimo Kim Il Sung performed in the war.
					 The report is summarized as follows:
						
					
					1. Brilliant victory of great Juche idea, Songun idea
						
					
					 President Kim Il Sung solved all problems arising in winning the victory in the war on the principle of Juche with his rare ideological and theoretical wisdom.
					
					 In "Let Us Wipe Out the Invaders by a Decisive Counter-offensive", a speech he made at the emergency meeting of the DPRK Cabinet on June 25, 1950, the day when the war broke out, and in a radio speech to all the Korean people on June 26, he said that the Korean War is an offspring of the U.S. foreign policy for aggression aimed at world hegemony and that the DPRK's war against it is the just Fatherland Liberation War for the freedom and independence of the country and democracy both in name and reality.
					
					 He elucidated the strategic idea of the Workers' Party of Korea for the victory in the war on the basis of the position and role of the popular masses in the revolutionary war.
					
					 In his radio speeches to all the Korean people on June 26 and September 9, 1950 he put forward the idea of patriotism and unity, calling for turning the war into an all-people war. He also set forth the idea of definitely ensuring the politico-ideological, strategic and tactical superiority of the army in the whole course of the war.
					
					 In different works and speeches he gave a profound exposition of the politico-ideological, strategic and tactical superiority and might of the Korean People's Army which any imperialist army or any army of reactionary exploiting class cannot have, their decisive role in the revolutionary war and the tasks and ways to fully display them.
					
					 In some important speeches he called for meeting the material need of the front with the efforts of the Korean people to suit the characteristics of the modern war, the actual conditions of the country and their patriotic enthusiasm and made clear the principled demand and ways.
					
					 The Juche-based idea of properly combining operations of large and small units, and regular warfare and guerilla warfare and successfully carrying on mountain warfare and nocturnal warfare takes an important place in his strategic idea.
					
					 The victory in the three-year Fatherland Liberation War was the victory of the Juche idea and Songun idea attaching importance to human being and loving the people over the imperialists' idea of aggression for reducing the Korean people to slaves again, and their misanthropy.
						
					
					2. Victory of Brilliant Wisdom and Outstanding Strategy, Tactics and War Methods
						
					
					 The young DPRK, five years since its liberation and two years since it had a regular army, and the people defeated the U.S., the boss of imperialism in the world which boasted of its history of aggression spanning a hundred and scores of years and its numerical and technical superiority. They owed the victory to the outstanding military wisdom, strategy and tactics and war methods of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Three days after the start of the war the 105 Tank Division rushed to Seoul and the DPRK flag fluttered on the "Capital Building" of the puppet forces. The operation for liberating Seoul shook the U.S. colonial ruling system to its roots.
					
					 Brave seamen of the DPRK sank 17 000-ton cruiser "Baltimore" which had been called "a moving island" and destroyed a 12 000-ton cruiser with only four torpedo boats in the waters off Jumunjin in accordance with the Juche-based war methods indicated by the President. This was specially recorded in the world history of sea battles.
					
					 The military miracles like the shining victory in the operation for liberating Taejon, typical of modern encircling warfare, successive siege and annihilation operations in different areas, attack on the "Pusan base" of the enemy and creation of "crisis in Taegu" were all closely related to the wise leadership of the President.
					
					 At the first stage of the war the Korean People's Army annihilated main forces of the south Korean puppet army, dealt a heavy blow to the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces and liberated over 90 percent of south Korea and more than 92 percent of its population. These tremendous achievements were a manifestation of the greatness and vitality of the Juche-based military idea and war methods and outstanding commanding art.
					
					 Every war method set forth by the President in that period was fresh and unique one suited to specific topography and conditions of the country.
					
					 The entire army and all people in the DPRK awarded the title of DPRK Marshal to Supreme Commander Kim Il Sung on February 7, 1953 out of their boundless reverence for him who performed undying feats in the Fatherland Liberation War. 
						
					
					3. Victory of Mental Power of Leader, Army and People
						
					
					 The victory in the Fatherland Liberation War is a result of the revolutionary faith and prodigious grit of President Kim Il Sung and the mental power of the army and the people closely united around the leader. 
					
					 There is always a way out of any adversity and one should defeat the enemy and win no matter how often he or she may have to die -- this is the President's pluck and will encouraging the Korean army and people to display indomitable mental power and patriotism in the war.
					
					 The army and people fought the war with a strong will to always follow and devotedly defend the supreme command, protect the cradle of their genuine life and happiness from the enemy in a do-or-die spirit and defend every inch of the country at the cost of their lives.
					
					 In the 1930s the President, a young general on this side of his twenties, proclaimed a war against the brigandish Japanese imperialists and defeated them through two decades of the hard-fought revolutionary war. He also defeated the world reactionary allied forces including formidable U.S. imperialists in the 1950s. Already in his forties he enjoyed deep reverence and trust from the world people as a brilliant commander who defeated two imperialisms and as a symbol of victory in the anti-imperialist struggle.
					
					 Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, carrying forward the great tradition of patriotism, creditably defended the socialist country and the revolution in the war without gunfire for decades and provided precious foundations for the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 The Korean army and people, advancing toward a final victory, closely united around Marshal Kim Jong Un, another peerlessly great man, will steadily carry forward the history and tradition of the war victory.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Rebukes Japan's Rhetoric over "Abduction Issue"
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Rebukes Japan's Rhetoric over "Abduction Issue" 
						
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- Matsubara, Japan's minister in charge of "abduction issue", on several occasions insisted that if the abductees do not come back while their families are alive, the abduction issue cannot be seen as settled and that if no moment is secured for the meeting between Megumi Yokota and her parents, one cannot say that the abduction issue has been settled. He went the lengths of making a mockery of the families of the abductees, saying that he would not get enraged though the abductees north Korea claims dead come back alive.
					 Clear is aim in insisting on the return of the abductees who have already died.
					
					 This politically-motivated fraud is aimed to win popularity by portraying the dead persons as alive. 
					
					 Matsubara said he would make positive efforts for the settlement of the "abduction issue" ahead of the tenth anniversary since former Prime Minister Koizumi's visit to the DPRK.
					
					 Matsubara's remarks cannot be interpreted otherwise than an intention not to settle the "abduction issue" because the dead persons cannot come back to life. This is another new challenge to the DPRK.
					
					 As far as the "abduction issue" is concerned, it had already been settled thanks to the DPRK's magnanimity and sincere efforts, so it does not exist any longer.
					
					 Japan has already been informed of the death of abductees.
					
					 The DPRK sent back the abductees and their families and articles left by the dead, as well as data on verifying the settlement of abduction. 
					
					 But the Japanese reactionaries are raising the abduction issue while portraying the dead as alive, in defiance of the DPRK's sincere efforts. Only those steeped in confrontation with the DPRK such as Matsubara can spread lies and commit sordid acts without hesitation in order to improve their images. No matter what lies they spread over the "abduction issue", they will only make those who lend an ear to them more pitiful.
					
					 Days are gone when they used to use the "abduction issue" as a lever for satisfying their political greed.
					
					 The opinion poll conducted by the Japanese government on July 19 showed that persons including youth are becoming less and less concerned about the "abduction issue". This tells that many Japanese have seen through the deceptive nature of the "abduction issue" and are paying no heed to it.
					
					 Japanese politicians should roll back the old-fashioned hostile policy toward the DPRK and swim with the trend of the times. This will be a right choice for winning political popularity.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Portrays Anti-DPRK Terrorism as Product of U.S.-S. Korea Conspiracy
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Portrays Anti-DPRK Terrorism as Product of U.S.-S. Korea Conspiracy
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- The hideous politically-motivated state-sponsored terrorist plot hatched by the south Korean puppet regime was recently detected and disclosed in the DPRK. This was not an accidental case but an inevitable product of the conspiracy between outsiders and their stooges who sought to stifle the DPRK.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a bylined article in this regard:
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak regime's hideous terrorist act was perpetrated, pursuant to its unchanged policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 The Lee group of traitors is an arch criminal who plunged the inter-Korean relations to the lowest ebb with its unprecedented confrontational policy against the DPRK. The sinister intention sought by the group through the policy is to deny the reconciliation, unity and reunification between the north and the south and do harm to the dignified social system in the DPRK. The south Korean regime, steeped in confrontation of social systems, drove the inter-Korean relations to the worst crisis while running amuck to hurt the DPRK in collusion with its U.S. and Japan masters.
					
					 The massive arms buildup and war drills by south Korean warmongers are a clear manifestation of the regime's attempt to invade the DPRK and an open military threat to it.
					
					 The recent hideous state-sponsored terrorist act is indicative of the U.S. method of provoking a war.
					
					 The U.S., buoyed by wild ambition for aggression, does not want to see peace on the Korean Peninsula. It has long dreamed of putting whole of Asia under its control by occupying Korea.
					
					 It is the ulterior aim of the U.S. to pave a broad way for making interference and effecting the strategy of aggression by instigating the puppet regime to further escalate confrontation and military conflicts between the north and the south.
					
					 The situation shows that downing the Lee Myung Bak regime and checking the pro-U.S. conservative forces' attempt to stay in power are directly linked with such important issues as preventing the danger of a new war in the Peninsula and saving the nation's destiny, not just simple replacement of "government".

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun DPRK Will Counter U.S. Provocation with Self-Defensive Tough Measure
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun DPRK Will Counter U.S. Provocation with Self-Defensive Tough Measure
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- The DPRK will take all self-defensive countermeasures as the U.S. does not hesitate the attempt at a politically-motivated, state-sponsored terrorist act, says Rodong Sinmun in a bylined article on Wednesday.
					 Unable to stifle the DPRK by force of arms and with economic sanctions, the U.S. imperialists are making desperate efforts to break the single-minded unity of the army and people of the DPRK, the article notes, and goes on: Their attempt at the heinous terrorist act is increasing the danger of war on the Korean Peninsula day by day.
					
					 They are manipulating such hideous politically-motivated provocations as the recent case, not thinking of the consequences.
					
					 The Korean people have demanded the U.S. authorities approach the issue of the Korean Peninsula with reason. But the U.S. belligerent forces are answering the DPRK's patience and magnanimity with such moves as stabbing the hearts of its army and people. 
					
					 There is nothing to expect or hope from the U.S. which commits dangerous provocation while violating the noble feelings deeply cherished in the hearts of the DPRK's army and people.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Japan's Moves to Draw Water to Its Mill Censured
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Japan's Moves to Draw Water to Its Mill Censured 
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- Japanese Foreign Minister Genba, addressing the ministerial meeting of the ASEAN Regional Forum held in Cambodia recently, talked about any dialogue, calling upon the DPRK to "restrain from additional provocation and take specific action for denuclearization". He went the lengths of underlining the need to implement the DPRK-U.S. agreement as soon as possible.
					 Rodong Sinmun in a bylined commentary Wednesday says in this regard:
					
					 By nature, Japan is not entitled to meddle in the issue of denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula and the issue of dialogue for it. This is entirely the issue which should be settled between the DPRK and the U.S. 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries have historically made wry words without principle at the talks related to the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula, complicating their process. The issue of its denuclearization will be settled without Japan's intervention if the right time comes and condition ripens.
					
					 As far as the "provocation issue" is concerned, the real provocateurs are the U.S. military belligerent forces keen on the rackets for military threat to the DPRK and the Japanese reactionaries following them. "Restrain of provocation" touted by them is a shameless brigandish rhetoric little short of urging the DPRK to remain a passive onlooker to the encroachment upon its sovereignty and aggression moves against it.
					
					 It is an inveterate habit of Japan to draw water to its mill by taking issue with others.
					
					 Some days ago, the Japanese reactionaries passed through the Diet session the basic law on atomic energy and the law on spacecraft allegedly to contribute to "ensuring the state security". This means openly stepping up nuclear armament and space militarization under the pretext of "ensuring the state security". To hush up public criticism of this, they are talking loudly of "additional provocation", nonexistent in the DPRK. It is their criminal attempt to portray the DPRK's nuclear test and satellite launch as "provocation" and push forward their nuclear armament and space militarization under that pretext. Such method will never work in the bright world today.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Cambodian King
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Cambodian King
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a congratulatory message from Norodom Sihamoni, king of Cambodia, on July 20.
					 The message said:
					
					 It is my great pleasure to extend the warmest congratulations on behalf of the people, Senate, parliament and the government of Kingdom of Cambodia and on my own behalf to Your Excellency on your receiving the title of DPRK Marshal.
					
					 I am convinced that the DPRK will achieve bigger development, prosperity and victory in all fields and play an important role in the region and the world under Your Excellency's outstanding leadership.
					
					 The two peoples of Cambodia and the DPRK will win great victory in the future, too, in the historic cause for the unity and ties of friendship and cooperation between the two countries.

articles.title: Greetings to Maldivian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Maldivian President
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Mohammed Waheed Hassan, president of Maldives, on its independence day.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Maldives would steadily develop on good terms, wishing the president of Maldives success in his responsible work for the country's prosperity.

articles.title: Flood Claims Human, Material Losses in DPRK
articles.content:
Flood Claims Human, Material Losses in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- There have been heavy rainfalls in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea since the start of rainy season on July 18.
					 The flood caused by heavy rains and typhoon-7 from 18 to 19 has brought big damage to various parts of the country.
					
					 According to data available, the flood left eight persons dead throughout the country as of July 22.
					
					 More than 650 dwelling houses were destroyed and nearly 3,870 houses submerged, leaving more than 16 250 people homeless.
					
					 Some 30 public buildings collapsed, 11,960 square meters of roads destroyed in 410 odd spots and 2 930 meters of bridges damaged in nearly 30 spots.
					
					 Houses in North Hamgyong Province were most badly damaged.
					
					 Meanwhile, more than 230 hectares of farmland were washed away or buried and 2 340 odd hectares inundated throughout the country.

articles.title: Flood-damage Recovery Project under Way in DPRK
articles.content:
Flood-damage Recovery Project under Way in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- Officials and other people across the DPRK are making efforts to recover from the flood damage.
					 Downpour, triggered by typhoon-7, hit the whole area of Korea on July 18 and 19. It rained heavily in some areas of Pyongyang City, North and South Phyongan, Jagang, South Hamgyong and Kangwon provinces from night of July 22 to 9:00 on July 24.
					
					 The downpour and strong rainstorm destroyed farmland, houses, public buildings and bridges and temporarily suspended train service in those areas, causing big damage.
					
					 The Cabinet, ministries, national institutions and local party and power bodies are concentrating efforts on recovering from the damage at an early date.
					
					 Officials across the country are going out to disaster-hit areas to learn about the damage and take necessary measures.
					
					 Service personnel help the people in their efforts.
					
					 People of Kangwon Province are repairing high-tension towers, bridges and waterways together with service personnel.
					
					 Similar projects are also brisk in South Hamgyong Province.
					
					 Tanchon City rapidly repaired more than 500 dwelling houses which had been submerged in Jikjol-dong with the help of service personnel and provided the inhabitants with food, fuel and foodstuffs, putting their life on normal basis. Sinhung and Yonggwang counties are pushing ahead with embankment restoration.
					
					 Destroyed houses have been rebuilt in cities and counties of Jagang and North and South Phyongan provinces including Huichon City and Ryongchon, Phihyon, Unsan and Pukchang counties.
					
					 The all-people drive to recover from the flood damage involves all fields of national economy. Meticulous work is organized to clear the farmland of damage and manure and cultivate crops.
					
					 Officials and workers in the fields of railway transport are buckling down to restoring roadbeds and railway bridges which were washed away or buried by landslides in different sections.

articles.title: 60 Flood Victims Rescued in DPRK
articles.content:
60 Flood Victims Rescued in DPRK 
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- 60 flood victims were rescued in the DPRK.
					 Downpour hit northern inland areas of Korea from the night of July 22. 65 mm of heavy rain fell in Unsan County, North Phyongan Province for three hours at dawn of July 23.
					
					 In Jwa-ri, where water from three valleys of Mts. Phinandok and Tongrim and Uhyon Pass meets to flow to the River Kuryong, the river flooded in a moment, sweeping the residential quarters.
					
					 Residents including several children and women who failed to evacuate and workers who worked there jointly sought an emergency shelter in a hillock, fighting torrents of water. Isolated incommunicado, they did not find a way out, in panic at rising water.  At that time a helicopter appeared.
					
					 After receiving an urgent report, the dear respected Kim Jong Un issued an emergency sortie order to a unit of the Air Force of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 On his order, servicepersons rushed to the scene aboard the helicopter and launched rescue operation immediately. With the helicopter finding it difficult to land due to mist hanging heavily, the servicepersons let the helicopter hover and lifted those one by one through rope ladder. 
					
					 Making several shuttle flights, they conducted rescue operation and successfully saved all the persons including six who were at the risk of being washed away.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from President of Russian Railways Company
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from President of Russian Railways Company
						
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a gift from Vladimir Yakunin, president of the Russian Railways Company.
					 The gift was handed over to an official concerned on Wednesday by Valery Reshetnikov, senior vice president of the company, on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Korean in Russia
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Korean in Russia
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- Jong Il Sim, a Korean residing in Russia, on a visit to the homeland presented a floral basket to the dear respected Kim Jong Un to congratulate his elevation to DPRK Marshal.
					 The floral basket was handed over to an official concerned on Wednesday.

articles.title: Congratulations to Indian President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Indian President
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent  a message to Pranab Mukherjee, congratulating him upon his election as president of India.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the traditional relations of DPRK-India friendship and cooperation would grow stronger in conformity with the aspiration and desire of the two nations and wished the Indian president great success in his responsible work for making the country powerful and prosperous.

articles.title: More Meetings Held to Congratulate Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
More Meetings Held to Congratulate Kim Jong Un  
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- Meetings of ministries, national institutions and units in the fields of electricity, coal and metal industries, etc. were held to congratulate the historic event in which the dear respected Kim Jong Un was awarded the title of DPRK Marshal.
					 A decision of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea, the DPRK National Defence Commission and the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly on awarding the title to him was read out at the meetings.
					
					 Speakers said awarding the title to him is a manifestation of the fixed will of all servicepersons and people to bring earlier the bright future of prosperity under his leadership.
					
					 The DPRK could give full play to the indestructible might of Korean-style socialism and usher in the gigantic history of another 100 years of the Juche era as it is holding him in the van of the party, state and army, they noted.
					
					 They called for advancing toward the final victory of the Juche revolution with confidence, united around him in single mind, and thus demonstrating the heroic stamina of Songun Korea.

articles.title: Wreath Laid before Cemetery of Fallen Heroes of KPA
articles.content:
Wreath Laid before Cemetery of Fallen Heroes of KPA
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the Vietnamese embassy here Wednesday laid a wreath before the Cemetery of Fallen Heroes of the Korean People's Army on the occasion of the 59th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Le Quang Ba, Vietnamese ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 Laid before the cemetery was a wreath in the name of the embassy.
					
					 Staff members observed a moment's silence in memory of fighters of the KPA who fell down in the anti-U.S. resistance war of the Vietnamese people.

articles.title: PAD "Achim" Popular among Students
articles.content:
PAD "Achim" Popular among Students
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- "Achim" (morning), a PAD for education manufactured by the Electronics Development Company in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, is enjoying popularity among local students.
					 The seven-inch PAD weighs 300 grams. Its control system and applications programs can be displayed in any of Korean, English, Chinese and Russian languages. It operates more than five hours, once charged.
					
					 Users can get teaching materials, references, dictionaries and scientific data in this multi-functional PAD.
					
					 Ri Yong Suk, a teacher at Pyongyang Secondary School No. 1, told KCNA that the PAD is helpful to improving education and developing students' intellectual faculties.

articles.title: Airborne Tourists on Increase in DPRK
articles.content:
Airborne Tourists on Increase in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- A tourist group came here on Tuesday by a chartered plane through the Shanghai-Pyongyang air route.
					 The flight is available on Tuesdays and Fridays.
					
					 The Harbin-Pyongyang flight began in April and Xian-Pyongyang flight in July by chartered planes.
					
					 The tourists stay in the DPRK for three nights and four days, and four nights and five days, during which they tour the capital city of Pyongyang, Kaesong Municipality and scenic Mts. Myohyang and Kumgang.
					
					 Meanwhile, tourists come here through the Pyongyang-Beijing, Pyongyang-Shenyang and Pyongyang-Kuala Lumpur air routes.
					
					 The grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang", to be started on August 1, will be one of the tourist attractions in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Kyongam Cement Factory Put into Commission
articles.content:
Kyongam Cement Factory Put into Commission
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- The Kyongam Cement Factory has started operation in the DPRK.
					 All the production processes of the factory ranging from feeding raw materials to packing and forwarding are automatically controlled by computers.
					
					 A commissioning ceremony took place Wednesday.

articles.title: Gravity-fed Water Supply System Introduced in Kaesong City, DPRK
articles.content:
Gravity-fed Water Supply System Introduced in Kaesong City, DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- A gravity-fed water supply system has been installed in Kaesong City, the DPRK.
					 This made it possible to supply quality drinking water to households, nurseries, kindergartens, schools and industrial establishments in the city in all seasons without using many motors and water pumps.
					
					 The city drew up a design for gravity-fed water supply to residential areas including high-rise apartment houses, scrupulously organized construction and built a reservoir in the high-lying area abundant in water resources of good quality.

articles.title: Performance by Art Group of Trade Unions Marks War Victory Day
articles.content:
Performance by Art Group of Trade Unions Marks War Victory Day
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- A performance "Our Eternal July 27" was given by the Workers' Art Group of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea at the Central Hall of Workers on Wednesday to celebrate the 59th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The performance began with choruses "Marshal Kim Il Sung, Supreme Commander Standing on the Podium of War Victory" and "Our July 27". Put on the stage were dialogic poem "Strength of Love", serial songs "Song for Defending the Country", "My Song in the Trench", "No One Knows", "To Decisive Battle" and "We Won" and other numbers.
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the feats Generalissimo Kim Il Sung performed for the war victory. He defeated the U.S.-led imperialist aggressor forces with his Juche-based military ideas and outstanding commanding arts and demonstrated before the world the indomitable stamina and dignity of heroic Korea.
					
					 The performers vividly depicted the feats of the army and people of the DPRK who fought heroic battles in the sacred war to defend the country.
					
					 Also put on the stage were male vocal solo and pangchang "When Singing of Songun", female vocal trio "Song of Best Wishes", an immortal masterpiece, and other numbers which hail the feats of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Oratorical Meeting of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Oratorical Meeting of Youth and Students Held
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- An oratorical meeting of youth and students took place at the Youth Park Open-air Theatre in Pyongyang on Wednesday to celebrate the 59th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The meeting started with celebration poem "Song of Praising War Victory Day". The orators vowed to firmly preserve the ever-victorious history and traditions provided by the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu. They also pledged to fully demonstrate the stamina and bravery of Songun Korean youth in today's general onward advance by carrying forward the indomitable fighting spirit that was displayed by heroic soldiers in the flames of war.
					
					 Kim Won Chol, student of Kim Il Sung University, in his oratory "Iron-willed Commander" said that President Kim Il Sung defeated strong U.S. imperialists with the Juche-oriented military idea and original strategies and tactics during the past Fatherland Liberation War and achieved the brilliant victory.
					
					 Kim Sol Mi, journalist of the Korean Central News Agency, in her oratory "War and Laughing" told about the personality of the President as a great man who said with broad smiling that the aggressors to stifle the young DPRK were foolish and the Yankees misjudged the Koreans.
					
					 Ryom Su Hyang, student of Pyongyang Sunan Agricultural College, in her oratory "Power of Korea" highly praised immortal revolutionary feats of leader Kim Jong Il who demonstrated the invincible might of socialist Korea by wining victory after victory in the confrontation with the U.S and other imperialists by wielding the treasured sword of Songun
					
					 Kim Chol Nam, worker of the Post Office in Kowon County, South Hamgyong Provincial Post and Telecommunication Management Bureau, in his oratory "Fireworks" said that the fireworks for victory brought by Kim Il Sung and protected by Kim Jong Il will steadily go on up to the reunification of the country under the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Present there were Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the C.C., the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, officials of the youth league and youth and students in the city of Pyongyang.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Children's Honor Prize Awarded to Schoolboy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Children's Honor Prize Awarded to Schoolboy
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il Children's Honor Prize was awarded to Jo Hyok Chol, former fourth-year pupil of Rinsan Primary School in North Hwanghae Province.
					 The 9-year old set an example in studying, organizational life and a good conduct movement and devoted his life to rescuing drowning schoolgirls.
					
					 A decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK on awarding the prize to Jo was published on Tuesday.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Attempted Terrorism Touches Off DPRK People's Wrath
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Attempted Terrorism Touches Off DPRK People's Wrath
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- South Korea's Lee Myung Bak regime recently attempted, in collusion with the United States, to demolish a statue in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 This fact has touched off the local people's anger.
					
					 Ro Se Il, a researcher at the Academy of Social Sciences, told KCNA:
					
					  "Rat-like Lee Myung Bak is really a political inferior ignorant of how things are going on.
					
					 Admittedly, nothing can break the single-minded unity of the DPRK people around their leader.
					
					 Rat Myung Bak, forsaken by the south Korean people for his political ignorance and his family members' irregularities, can never understand it.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will never pardon the clan of rats seeking to hurt the dignity of its supreme leadership."
					
					 Han Su Ryon, a teacher at Pyongyang Teacher Training College, said:
					
					 "The Lee group of traitors is scheming to tarnish the DPRK image and put a brake on its development through such hideous terrorism, but it is no more than a daydream."
					
					 Ryu Jin Hyok, a student at Pyongyang University of Mechanical Engineering, said:
					
					 "The Lee group is now busy with disclaiming the recently disclosed terrorist case, describing it as 'agitprop' and 'impossible one' in a bid to mislead public opinion. But the group's poor assertion only goes to reveal its true colors as a clan of plotters and saboteurs.
					
					 A sledgehammer should be dealt at the group of rats for its heinous crimes."

articles.title: Deposing Human Rights Committee Chairman Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Deposing Human Rights Committee Chairman Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- The National Council of Christian Churches in south Korea Monday issued a statement calling for deposing Hyon Phyong Chol from the post of chairman of the puppet Human Rights Committee, according to south Korean CBS.
					 The organization condemned Lee Myung Bak for going to let him remain in his office.
					
					 Hyon knows nothing about human rights and is being criticized as "para-dropped" figure as he fawns on power, said the organization, warning Lee to lend an ear to the public voice.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Cracking Down on People Revering Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Attempted Terrorism Touches Off DPRK People's Wrath
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- South Korea's Lee Myung Bak regime recently attempted, in collusion with the United States, to demolish a statue in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 This fact has touched off the local people's anger.
					
					 Ro Se Il, a researcher at the Academy of Social Sciences, told KCNA:
					
					  "Rat-like Lee Myung Bak is really a political inferior ignorant of how things are going on.
					
					 Admittedly, nothing can break the single-minded unity of the DPRK people around their leader.
					
					 Rat Myung Bak, forsaken by the south Korean people for his political ignorance and his family members' irregularities, can never understand it.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will never pardon the clan of rats seeking to hurt the dignity of its supreme leadership."
					
					 Han Su Ryon, a teacher at Pyongyang Teacher Training College, said:
					
					 "The Lee group of traitors is scheming to tarnish the DPRK image and put a brake on its development through such hideous terrorism, but it is no more than a daydream."
					
					 Ryu Jin Hyok, a student at Pyongyang University of Mechanical Engineering, said:
					
					 "The Lee group is now busy with disclaiming the recently disclosed terrorist case, describing it as 'agitprop' and 'impossible one' in a bid to mislead public opinion. But the group's poor assertion only goes to reveal its true colors as a clan of plotters and saboteurs.
					
					 A sledgehammer should be dealt at the group of rats for its heinous crimes."

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Bangladeshi Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Bangladeshi Paper
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- The detailed gist of general secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" was carried by the July 19th issue of Natun Katha, the Bangladeshi paper.
					 The work, published on August 4, 1997, deals with the immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung for national reunification and formulates the three principles of national reunification, the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as the three charters for national reunification and sets forth tasks and ways for national reunification on their basis.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Praised as Illustrious Brilliant Commander
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Praised as Illustrious Brilliant Commander
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee issued a statement on July 19 in celebration of Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un's holding of the title of DPRK Marshal.
					 This is a great event for the Korean people in accomplishing the Songun revolutionary cause, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un deeply grasped the military ideas, strategy and tactics of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in his early years.
					
					 He is an invincible and iron-willed commander who develops the KPA into a matchless revolutionary army and the DPRK into a military power with his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 He has steadily enriched the Juche-oriented military ideas, strategy and tactics of the Generalissimos and led the Songun revolutionary cause pioneered in Mt. Paektu to a brilliant victory.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un, identical to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, is an illustrious commander of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Socialist Korea would surely win victory in the decisive battle with the U.S. imperialists and all other hostile forces under his leadership.

articles.title: Foreign Media Introduce DPRK
articles.content:
Foreign Media Introduce DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- Foreign media gave wide publicity to the Korean people's strenuous efforts to spruce up the country.
					 ITAR-TASS of Russia said:
					
					 The DPRK regards the environment preservation as a patriotic work for the wellbeing of the people.
					
					 The popular movement to green the whole land of the country is a regular event every year.
					
					 Measures have been taken to protect forests, and the number of natural reserves is on the steady increase.
					
					 La Juventud, the Uruguayan paper, reported:
					
					 A dynamic drive to manage the land in a promising way is being undertaken everywhere in the DPRK.
					
					 The fields were rezoned into large standardized ones and the nature-driven waterways were built.
					
					 The completion of the Taegyedo Tideland, the biggest ever in the history of tideland reclamation, turned the vast expanse of the shore into plain, fish farm and saltern, thereby reshaping the coastline of the country.
					
					 People's Daily of China said thanks to the priority given by the DPRK government to the environmental preservation, a great progress in this work has been made in Pyongyang and it became cleaner.
					
					 The Nepalese paper Charcha, the Lao paper Noum Lao and the Internet homepage of the Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea introduced the DPRK conducting the drive to bring about a radical change in the appearance of the land.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War Marked by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War Marked by Foreign Papers
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- Cambodian and Pakistani papers carried special write-ups to mark the 59th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The July 12th issue of the Cambodian newspaper Pracheachon carried an article titled "Kim Il Sung, upholding the banner of independence" with a photo of President Kim Il Sung acknowledging the enthusiastic cheers of the military paraders.
					
					 The article said:
					
					 The Korean people frustrated the invasion by the U.S. imperialists and won a great victory in the war nearly 60 years ago.
					
					 Their victory was attributable to the outstanding military leadership and Juche-oriented military war methods of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He put forward the original war methods so that the Korean People's Army could defeat the enemies in every battle and bring earlier the final victory in the war.
					
					 Baluchistan Times of Pakistan carried an article under the title of "Ironed-willed brilliant commander" on July 15.
					
					 Kim Il Sung forced U.S. imperialism that boasted of being the "strongest" in the world to meet the fate of a setting sun for the first time in history with his wise leadership over the Korean army and people and ushered in a new era of surge in the struggle against the U.S. and other imperialists, the article said.
					
					 The world progressives praise him as an ever-victorious and iron-willed brilliant commander, a great strategist and symbol of victory in the anti-imperialist struggle, it concluded.

articles.title: Swedish Figure Congratulates Kim Jong Un's Elevation to DPRK Marshal
articles.content:
Swedish Figure Congratulates Kim Jong Un's Elevation to DPRK Marshal 
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- Christer Lundgren, chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, on July 19 made public a statement congratulating the dear respected Kim Jong Un on receiving the title of DPRK Marshal. 
					 The army and people of the DPRK will soon greet July 27, the anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War (Korean War) amid a great joy of having awarded the title of DPRK Marshal to Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), he said in his statement, and went on:
					
					 The Korean people dashed the ambition of the imperialist aggressors to grab the whole of the Korean Peninsula and honorably protected the sovereignty and territory of the country by displaying matchless bravery and heroic self-sacrificing spirit in the hardest-fought 1950-1953 Fatherland Liberation War against the invasion by the U.S. and forces following it.
					
					 Awarding the title of DPRK Marshal to Kim Jong Un is a historical event of great significance in the struggle of the Korean people to defend socialism and build a thriving nation. 
					
					 All the Korean people, including the servicepersons, warmly hail this historic event.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Praised by French Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Praised by French Organization 
						
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- The France-Korea Friendship Association on July 19 posted on its Internet website a special article congratulating Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), on receiving the title of DPRK Marshal. 
					 The website carried his picture among soldiers of the KPA.
					
					 It said that the title of DPRK Marshal awarded to Kim Jong Un is an expression of deep confidence and absolute support of all the army and people of the DPRK for him. 
					
					 This is a historic event displaying the firm will of the Korean people to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche under his leadership, it said, and went on:
					
					 Celebrations are being held in the DPRK to extend glory to the supreme leader Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The France-Korea Friendship Association shares pleasure with the Korean people and believes that the socialist cause of Korea will surely emerge victorious under his leadership.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre el Parque de Atracciones del Pueblo Rungna
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre el Parque de Atracciones del Pueblo Rungna
						
 Pyongyang, 25 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal  Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recorrio el Parque de Atracciones del Pueblo Rungna a punto de inauguracion.
					 El estuvo primero en la cancha de mini-golf.
					
					 Senalando que la cancha ha sido acondicionada en armonia con el medioambiente del islote Rungna, instruyo sembrar ahi muchos arboles para que se dieran las sombras donde puedan refrescarse en el verano los que vienen a descansar.
					
					 Acto seguido, dio vuelta por la Piscina de Rungna.
					
					 Se mostro contento de que  las instalaciones de distintos tipos y el ambiente periferico hayan sido ataviados en colores blanco, azul y verde, de modo que toda la piscina luciera limpia y fresca.
					
					 Durante el recorrido por la cancha de baloncesto, la de voleibol y la de voleibol de playa, acondicionadas en la azotea del edificio de cabinas y duchas, dijo complacido que se ha aprovechado bien el espacio y renovado magnificamente la zona periferica.
					
					 Enseno que se debe instalar en la piscina la sala de tratamiento y el grupo de socorristas para los primeros auxilios y el rescate.
					
					 Resalto la necesidad de construir en el futuro en las ciudades locales las piscinas como esta, calificandola de la ejemplar conveniente al nombre del parque que lleva la palabra "pueblo".
					
					 Volvio a evaluar los meritos de los constructores militares apuntando que la piscina es una obra perfecta.
					
					 A continuacion, Kim Jong Un se dirigio al Acuario de Delfines.
					
					 Se entero del plan de servicio en la refresqueria y el quiosco de souvenir.
					
					 En la sala de divulgacion de conocimientos cientificos y tecnicos, instruyo instalar adicionalmente los equipos necesarios para dar amplios conocimientos del mar.
					
					 Seguidamente, vio en el hall de observacion del acuario las habilidades de delfines, tales como el baile en giro, la marcha atras, el salto sobre el agua y el toque de pelota en suspension.
					
					 Recordando que el Parque de Atracciones del Pueblo Rungna fue la obra a que prestaba especial atencion el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, dijo cuan alegre se habria puesto el si hubiera visto este parque terminado.
					
					 Ahora, se construyen una tras otra en la capital las creaciones monumentales como este parque, senalo y anadio que tomandolas por ejemplo, se debe construir en todo el pais los edificios que convengan a la idiosincrasia y demanda estetica del pueblo coreano. 
					
					 Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Jang Song Thaek, Choe Thae Bok, Pak To Chun, Kim Yong Il, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Phyong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok, Ri Jae Il, Kim Pyong Ho y Pak Chun Hong.

articles.title: Inaugurado Parque de Atracciones de Rungna en presencia de Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Inaugurado Parque de Atracciones de Rungna en presencia de Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, 25 de julio (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurado en esta capital el otro magnifico Parque de Atracciones del Pueblo Rungna, otra creacion monumental. 
					 El parque es un fruto del calido amor al pueblo y eterno patrimonio socialista cuya construccion estuvo bajo la profunda atencion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y termino gracias a los ingentes esfuerzos fisicos y mentales del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 El parque, situado en el islote Rungna en el pintoresco rio Taedong, se compone del acuario de delfines, la piscina, el area de recreo y la cancha de mini-golf, etc.
					
					 Tuvo lugar solemnemente el dia 25 la ceremonia inaugural con la presencia del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un y su esposa Ri Sol Ju.
					
					 Todos los participantes acogieron hospitalariamente al Maximo Dirigente con estruendosas aclamaciones de "Vivas".
					
					 Un constructor militar y una trabajadora entregaron ramos de flores a Kim Jong Un .
					
					 A la ocasion asistieron Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Jong Gak, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Kang Sok Ju, Kim Won Hong, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Kim Phyong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok, Kwak Pom Gi, Ro Tu Chol, Ri Pyong Sam y otros funcionarios de las instituciones del partido, fuerzas armadas y el poder, las organizaciones de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, los constructores militares, los trabajadores capitalinos, los jovenes y ninos escolares.
					
					 Fueron invitados los matrimonios de los representantes diplomaticos, los delegados de organizaciones internacionales y los delegados interinos, acreditados en Corea.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam y Choe Yong Rim cortaron la cinta de inauguracion. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un y Ri Sol Ju recorrieron el parque junto con los cuadros del partido, el Estado y el ejercito y los invitados extranjeros.
					
					 En el acuario de delfines, el paso revista al hall de observacion de delfines, el estanque para la funcion de habilidades, la sala de divulgacion de conocimientos cientifico-tecnicos y otros puntos dando instrucciones detalladas para asegurar en el maximo nivel el disfrute de la funcion y el confort de los visitantes.
					
					 El Mariscal y su esposa disfrutaron en compania de los huespedes extranjeros las habilidades de los delfines que practicaban al son de musicas divertidas, mostrandose sonrientes imaginando a los habitantes, jovenes y escolares que descansarian ahi con mucha alegria y risas. 
					
					  Estrecharon la mano uno por uno de los invitados extranjeros que les felicitaban y saludaban hospitalariamente, y sostuvieron conversaciones con ellos en una atmosfera cordial y amistosa.
					
					  Tras recorrer la cancha de mini-golf, Kim Jong Un llego a la piscina de Rungna donde expreso su gran satisfaccion de que las piscinitas, el edificio de cabinas y duchas y las demas facilidades y el medioambiente del contorno hayan sido acondicionados en perfecta armonia y de manera fresca y multifuncional convirtiendose en un orgulloso destino de descanso cultural del pueblo.
					
					  Mirando a los estudiantes que se divertian deslizando desde el alto tobogan y entablando juegos en las canchas de voleibol de playa, baloncesto y voleibol, dijo que se debe facilitar al pueblo coreano mas condiciones de descanso cultural en el maximo nivel, de que se pueda hacer alarde al mundo.
					
					  En el area de recreo de Rungna escucho con sumo placer las sonrisas de felicidad de los trabajadores montando la silla giratoria en vertical, la cabina giratoria de amistad, el avion de vuelo espacial y otros aparatos de diversiones.
					
					  Diciendo que el partido tiene la voluntad de hacer vivir en la opulencia socialista al pueblo coreano, el mejor del mundo que vino apoyando con fidelidad al partido superando multiples pruebas, destaco la importancia de administrar y operar bien el nuevo parque de atracciones.

articles.title: Concurso de oratoria de jovenes por el dia de victoria en la guerra
articles.content:
Concurso de oratoria de jovenes por el dia de victoria en la guerra
 Pyongyang, 25 de julio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 25 en el capitalino Teatro al Aire Libre del Parque Juventud el concurso de oratoria de los jovenes y estudiantes dedicado al 59o aniversario de la victoria del pueblo coreano en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					 En el acto iniciado con la poesia "Oda al dia de la victoria en la guerra", los oradores expresaron la determinacion de defender firmemente la historia y la tradicion de victorias creadas por los grandes hombres del monte Paektu y demostrar sin reservas el temperamento y la valentia de los jovenes coreanos del Songun en la marcha de hoy por el gran auge dando continuidad al indoblegable espiritu de lucha con que combatieron los soldados heroicos en los dias de guerra.
					
					 En la oracion "Comandante de Acero", el estudiante de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, Kim Won Chol, recordo que el Presidente Kim Il Sung logro la victoria brillante al derrotar en la pasada guerra coreana al poderoso imperialismo norteamericano con la superioridad de su autoctona idea militar y originales estrategia y tacticas.
					
					 En su obra "Guerra y Sonrisa", Kim Sol Mi, periodista de la Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea, narro las cualidades de gran hombre del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					 "Fuerza de Corea", tema de Ryom Su Hyang de la Escuela de Agricultura de Sunan de Pyongyang, elogio las inmortales hazanas revolucionarias del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien hizo galas del poderio invencible de la Corea socialista al lograr victorias sucesivas en la batalla de confrontacion antiimperialista y antiyanqui en virtud de su politica omnipotente del Songun.
					
					 Kim Chol Nam, obrero del Correo del Distrito de Kowon de la Direccion de Comunicacion de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur, intervino con el titulo de "Fuegos Artificiales" destacando que los fuegos artificiales de la victoria dada por el Presidente  Kim Il Sung y defendida por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il continuaran los de la reunificacion gracias al Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 En la ocasion, estuvieron presentes el presidente Jon Yong Nam y otros funcionarios del Comite Central del Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, los jovenes y estudiantes de esta capital.

articles.title: ACNC publica informacion sobre hazanas militares de Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
ACNC publica informacion sobre hazanas militares de Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, 25 de julio (ACNC) -- Quedo publicada el dia 25 la informacion de la Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea sobre las inmortales hazanas del Generalisimo Kim Il Sung realizadas por la victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria (1950-1953).
					 El texto resumido de la informacion titulada "Sera eterna la historia de gran victoria en la guerra frente al imperialismo norteamericano" sigue abajo:
						
					
					1. Victoria fulminante de la gran idea Juche, la del Songun
						
					
					 El Presidente Kim Il Sung resolvio en el principio de la idea Juche todos los asuntos determinantes de la victoria en guerra dando pruebas de su extraordinaria perspicacia ideo-teorica.
					
					 El 25 de junio de 1950, dia de estallido de la guerra coreana, pronuncio un discurso titulado "Aniquilemos a los agresores armados mediante la contraofensiva decisiva" en la reunion extraordinaria del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y al dia siguiente, hizo otro discurso por radio dirigido a todo el pueblo coreano.
					
					 En esas ocasiones, aclaro que la guerra coreana es producto directo de la agresiva politica exterior de EE.UU. para la hegemonia mundial y deviene para el pueblo de la RPDC la justa Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria para defender la libertad, la independencia y la democracia de la patria.
					
					 Trazo la idea estrategica del Partido por la victoria a base de la posicion y el papel que juegan el hombre y las masas populares en la guerra revolucionaria.
					
					 En sus discursos radiales transmitidos a todo el pueblo el 26 de junio y el 9 de septiembre de 1950, presento la idea de patriotismo y unidad consistente en librar la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria como la de todo el pueblo.
					
					 En todo el curso de la guerra, planteo el pensamiento de mantener con firmeza la superioridad ideo-politica y estrategico-tactica del ejercito.
					
					 A traves de sus obras y discursos, el Presidente Kim Il Sung dio profundas explicaciones sobre la superioridad ideo-politica y estrategico-tactica del Ejercito Popular de Corea, que no puede tener ningun ejercito imperialista ni el de la clase explotadora reaccionaria, y su poderio y el papel que juega ella en el cumplimiento de la guerra revolucionaria, y enseno las tareas y remedios para ponerla de manifiesto.
					
					 En otros discursos importantes, presento la idea de cubrir en el principio de autoconfianza las demandas materiales del frente conforme a las caracteristicas de guerra moderna, la situacion del pais y al entusiasmo patriotico del pueblo coreano. Igualmente, dilucido especificamente las demandas de principio y remedios para poner en practica esa idea.
					
					 Ocupa una posicion importante en las ideas estrategicas del Presidente Kim Il Sung la de combinar correctamente las batallas de grandes unidades y las de pequenos destacamentos, los combates regulares y los guerrilleros y los en zonas montanosas y los nocturnos.
					
					 La victoria en la trienal Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria fue la de la idea Juche, la del Songun, caracterizada por el aprecio al hombre y el amor al pueblo, frente a la idea agresiva y misantropica del imperialismo que pretendio colonizar nuevamente al pueblo coreano. 
						
					
					II victoria de perspicacia genial, destacada estrategia y tactica y metodo de combate
						
					
					 La joven Republica y el pueblo, que datan de los 5 anos desde su fundacion y de 2 anos apenas desde cuando se fundo el ejercito regular, vencio a Estados Unidos, cabecilla del imperialismo mundial, que se jactaba de la historia de agresion de ciento y tantos anos, la superioridad numerica y tecnologica, lo que se debe enteramente a la genial perspicacia militar, la destacada estrategia y tactica y metodo de combate.
					
					 La embestida de Seul de la Division de Tanques 105 y la izada de la bandera de la RPDC en la Capitolio y otros logros alcanzados durante los 3 dias desde el inicio de la guerra y la operacion de liberacion de Seul azotaron de raiz el sistema de dominacion colonial de EE.UU.
					
					 Segun el metodo de combate iluminado por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, en el mar frente a Jumunjin con solo 4 torpederos los valientes marineros del EPC hundieron el crucero pesado del imperialismo norteamericano "Baltimore" y destruyeron el otro ligero, realizando gran hazana registrable con letra dorada en la historia de guerra naval del mundo.
					
					 Es imposible pensar al margen de la sabia direccion del Presidente en la brillante victoria de la operacion de libracion de Taejon donde se creo el gran ejemplo de la guerra de cerca moderno, los sucesivos combates de aniquilamiento por asedio por doquier, la operacion de ataque a la "base de Pusan" de los enemigos, la creacion de la "crisis de Taegu" y otros prodigios militares.
					
					 A principios de la guerra los uniformados del EPC eliminaron los principales colectivos del ejercito titere surcoreano y dieron golpes demoledores a las tropas agresoras yanquis, mientras liberaron mas de 90 % de las regiones surcoreanas y mas de 92 por ciento de la poblacion surcoreana.
					
					 Los considerables exitos en el combate en la primera etapa de la guerra demostraron la idea militar y metodo de combate autoctonos, el destacado arte de mando y la grandeza y la vitalidad.
					
					 Todos los metodos de combate presentados en este periodo son los nuevos y originales adecuados a la destallada topografia y situacion del pais.
					
					 Todo el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea otorgaron el 7 de febrero de 1953 el titulo del mariscal al Comandante Supremo del EPC Kim Il Sung quien acumulo imborrables hazanas en la historia de la Guerra de la Liberacion de la Patria en reflejo de infinita veneracion.
					
					 
					
					III Victoria de dirigente y fuerza espiritual del ejercito y el pueblo
						
					
					 La victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria fue la de la conviccion revolucionaria y la audacia sin par del Presidente Kim Il Sung y la fuerza espiritual del ejercito y el pueblo unido monoliticamente en torno al lider.
					
					 La audacia valiente y firme voluntad del Presidente sirvieron de la fuente principal de la indoblegable fuerza espiritual y de una fuerza motriz del espiritu patriotico que demostraron el ejercito y el pueblo coreanos en los dias de guerra.
					
					 La firme voluntad de defender a costa de la vida a la Comandancia Suprema y la decision de aniquilar a los enemigos que intentaban quitar la vida verdadera y la cuna de felicidad, estos fueron la indoblegable fuerza espiritual del ejercito y el pueblo coreanos que defendieron la patria con su sangre.
					
					 El Presidente quien como general juvenil de unos 20 anos declaro la guerra antijaponesa contra el imperialismo japones y lo derroto desplegando la guerra revolucionaria de mas de 20 anos.
					
					 Y en la decada de los 50 del siglo pasado vencio a la alianza combinada de los reaccionarios del mundo encabezada por el imperialismo yanqui.
					
					 Como resultado, ya a los 40 anos el Presidente recibio la veneracion infinita y la confianza del mundo como genial sin precedente quien derroto a los imperialistas y simbolo de victoria en la lucha antiimperialista.
					
					 El Generalisimo Kim Jong Il al continuar la brillante tradicion del patriotismo, defendio firmemente durante decenas de anos en la guerra revolucionaria sin tiroteos la patria socialista y la revolucion y preparo la base preciosa para la culminacion de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					 El ejercito y el pueblo coreanos que avanzan hacia la victoria final uniendose monoliticamente en torno al Mariscal Kim Jong Un, llevaran adelante la historia y la tradicion de victoria en la guerra.

articles.title: "Achim" - laptop para la educacion
articles.content:
"Achim" - laptop para la educacion
 Pyongyang, 25 de julio (ACNC) -- Ultimamente, esta en boga entre los escolares coreanos el laptop para la educacion de marca "Achim".
					 Su pantalla de cristal tiene 7 pulgadas y pesa 300g.
					
					 Es posible anotar en el idioma deseado entre el coreano, el ingles, el chino y el ruso el sistema de operacion, los programas de aplicaciones, las notas de introduccion y la ventana del usuario.
					
					 "Achim" no tiene accesorios auxiliares como teclado y opera mas de 5 horas con la bateria cargada de lleno.
					
					 Se recomienda para los alumnos de la primaria y la secundaria y para el uso en la oficina y en general.
					
					 Con el teclado sensorial electromagnetico en la pantalla, se puede introducir los textos de manuales, libros de referencia, diccionarios y establecer las bases de datos como los cientifico-tecnicos.
					
					 Tiene otras funciones como filmacion, procesamiento de videos, grabacion y reproduccion de lo grabado y videojuegos.
					
					 La profesora de la Escuela Secundaria No.1 de Pyongyang Ri Yong Suk (30 anos de edad) dijo a la ACNC que "Achim" es compatible con los ordenadores de otros tipos y muy util para el mejoramiento de la calidad de educacion y el desarrollo intelectual de los alumnos.
					
					 El laptop se produce en la Compania de Desarrollo de Productos Electronicos.
